verbose_text: In stems, PthERF36, 75, and 77 were highly induced by ABA treatment, but PthERF77 did not show discrepancy from controls at 24 h. PthERF80, 118, 124, and 154 showed similar expression patterns, and these genes were generally upregulated or did not differ significantly from the controls.
evidence: PthERF36, 75, and 77 were highly induced by ABA
